transcription: Spectators kept pouring into the Kaohsiung Arena on the 24th and 25th of July 2009. Two days that continue to stand out in the chronicles of dance sport. One of the biggest crowds ever came to watch the Latin, Rock and Roll and Standard Contests, staged as part of the World Games in the Taiwanese port city.  Standard went first with a stellar lineup that included the top favorites from Germany and Italy.  Yes, it's a great feeling.  chance to compete in an event comparable only with the Olympics. The overwhelming experience let Silvia forget all sacrifices on her way to dancing in Kaohsiung on this memorable day.  you
